text:
This is a sample section about battery temperature monitoring.
The RV-C protocol allows temperature monitoring at 0.1 degree resolution.
Temperature values are reported in degrees Celsius.
Valid range is typically -40C to 125C.
title: Battery Temperature

text:
This section covers water tank level monitoring.
Level sensors provide data in percentage of full.
Values range from 0% (empty) to 100% (full).
RV-C uses 1-byte integer values for level reporting.
title: Water Tank Level
